1370: Hilduardis moved to Verckens merct.A.1 after marriage.
Got married to Lutgeri at age 26 in 1370.
1371: Gave birth to Thedwi in 1371 at age 27.
1372: Gave birth to Aleydis in 1372 at age 28.
1373: Gave birth to Godeweris in 1373 at age 29.
1374: Gave birth to Woutermanne in 1374 at age 30.
1380: Gave birth to Natelien in 1380 at age 36.
1381: Gave birth to Willai in 1381 at age 37.
1383: Gave birth to Atghardis in 1383 at age 39.
1384: Gave birth to Beatrice in 1384 at age 40.
Lost daughter Aleydis when Aleydis was 13 years old.
Lost son Woutermanne when Woutermanne was 11 years old.
